Desc.entry: Society that manages the 46 plot allotment owned by Sheffield City Council. The society runs a trading hut each weekend with produce and horticultural supplies for sale, tends the community garden which is open to the general public and holds regular society meetings at the on-site community hut.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Sat & Sun 9am-12pm (trading hut); every 2 months (society meetings). Please contact for further details
